text: Neu phat hien ca hai (nhan chung) la ke toi loi (khai man, pham loi the hoac lua gat) thi hay đe hai nguoi khac (thuoc than nhan nguoi chet) đung ra the cho cho hai nhan chung đa pham toi, va yeu cau ho the voi Allah: “Su lam chung cua chung toi trung thuc hon su lam chung cua hai nguoi truoc va chung toi khong vi pham. (Neu chung toi vi pham) thi chung toi se la nhung ke lam đieu sai quay.”
